journeyMilestones.title: Company Foundation
journeyMilestones.description: AICMT was founded with a vision to revolutionize sustainable manufacturing through innovative technology solutions.

journeyMilestones.title: First Major Partnership
journeyMilestones.description: Secured our first major partnership with a leading automotive manufacturer to implement sustainable production processes.

journeyMilestones.title: Technology Breakthrough
journeyMilestones.description: Developed breakthrough AI-powered optimization algorithms that reduce manufacturing waste by 40%.

teamMembers.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
teamMembers.description: Leading expert in sustainable manufacturing with over 15 years of experience in AI and automation systems.

teamMembers.name: Michael Chen
teamMembers.description: Specializes in process optimization and lean manufacturing principles with a focus on environmental sustainability.

teamMembers.name: Emily Rodriguez
teamMembers.description: Environmental scientist dedicated to developing eco-friendly manufacturing solutions and reducing industrial carbon footprint.

achievements.title: ISO 14001 Certification
achievements.description: Successfully achieved ISO 14001 Environmental Management System certification, demonstrating our commitment to environmental responsibility.

achievements.title: Industry Innovation Award
achievements.description: Received the Manufacturing Innovation Award for our AI-powered waste reduction technology from the National Manufacturing Association.

achievements.title: Carbon Neutral Certification
achievements.description: Achieved carbon neutral status across all manufacturing operations through innovative process improvements and renewable energy adoption.

impactStories.title: Waste Reduction Initiative
impactStories.description: Implemented comprehensive waste reduction program across all production lines using AI-powered optimization algorithms.
impactStories.impact_metrics: 50% reduction in manufacturing waste, 30% cost savings, 25% reduction in raw material usage

impactStories.title: Energy Efficiency Program
impactStories.description: Deployed smart energy management systems to optimize power consumption and integrate renewable energy sources.
impactStories.impact_metrics: 40% reduction in energy consumption, 60% renewable energy adoption, $2M annual savings

impactStories.title: Supply Chain Optimization
impactStories.description: Revolutionized supply chain management through AI-driven logistics optimization and sustainable sourcing practices.
impactStories.impact_metrics: 35% reduction in transportation emissions, 20% faster delivery times, 15% cost reduction

invalidYear.expectedError: Year must be a valid number

invalidYearRange.expectedError: Year must be between 1900 and current year

invalidDisplayOrder.expectedError: Display order must be a valid number
